issue.title: [Rust]: Adapt existing benchmarks to have proper execution over AVX-512
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10615](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10615). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Some benchmarks are utilizing the same data which is easily predictable during execution, moreover, some of them the insufficient amount of data to utilize the power of the implemented operations.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10615?focusedCommentId=17332162) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Migrated to github: https://github.com/apache/arrow-rs/issues/134
